root.InquirySqlQueryFirst: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, rownum r FROM (
root.IWGT: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'IWGT' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, GTEE_AMT AMOUNT,GTEE_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, APPL_NM BENE_NM, EXPIRY_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.IWGT_EM_STLMNT
root.IMCO: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'IMCO' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, COLL_AMT AMOUNT,COLL_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, DRWR_NM BENE_NM, DUE_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.IMCO_EM_TRXN
root.FAEF: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'FAEF' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, COLL_AMT AMOUNT,COLL_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, DRWR_NM BENE_NM, DUE_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.IMCO_EM_TRXN
root.EXCO: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'EXCO' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, COLL_AMT AMOUNT,COLL_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, DRWE_NM BENE_NM, DUE_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.EXCO_EM_CREATE
root.SHGT: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'SHGT' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, COLL_AMT AMOUNT,COLL_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, DRWE_NM BENE_NM, DUE_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.SHGT_EM_GTEEDTLS
root.EXLC: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'EXLC' C_MODULE,'F05030700899' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, LC_AMT AMOUNT,LC_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, BENE_NM BENE_NM, EXPIRY_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.EXLC_EM_ADV WHERE ( 1=1 ) AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = 'CSBANK' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}'
root.IMLC: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'IMLC' C_MODULE,'F05030700829' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, LC_AMT AMOUNT,LC_CCY CURRENCY, BENE_NM BENE_NM, EXPIRY_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.IMLC_EM_ISSUE WHERE ( 1=1 ) AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = 'CSBANK' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}'
root.OWGT: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'OWGT' C_MODULE,'F05030700826' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, GTEE_AMT AMOUNT,GTEE_CCY CURRENCY, BENE_NM BENE_NM, EXPIRY_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.OWGT_EM_GTEEDTLS WHERE ( 1=1 ) AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = 'CSBANK' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}'
root.FAP: SELECT 'N/A' C_TRX_STATUS, 'N/A' PARENT_MAIN_REF, 'N/A' C_MAIN_REF,'FAP' C_MODULE,'F05030700901' C_FUNC_ID, 0 I_EVENT_TIMES,'CSBANK' C_BK_GROUP_ID,'${unitcode}' C_UNIT_CODE,'Financial Analytics Portal' C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, 0 AMOUNT,'USD' CURRENCY, 'Analytics Module' BENE_NM, SYSDATE EXPIRY_DT FROM DUAL WHERE 1=2
root.DAP: SELECT 'N/A' C_TRX_STATUS, 'N/A' PARENT_MAIN_REF, 'N/A' C_MAIN_REF,'DAP' C_MODULE,'F05030700902' C_FUNC_ID, 0 I_EVENT_TIMES,'CSBANK' C_BK_GROUP_ID,'${unitcode}' C_UNIT_CODE,'Dashboard Analytics Portal' C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, 0 AMOUNT,'USD' CURRENCY, 'Analytics Module' BENE_NM, SYSDATE EXPIRY_DT FROM DUAL WHERE 1=2
